source.name: VEP
source.desc: Predicted nonsense mediated decay effects for this variant by VEP

fields.name: Consequence
fields.desc: Consequence type

fields.name: IMPACT
fields.desc: Subjective impact classification of consequence type

fields.name: SYMBOL
fields.desc: Gene symbol (e.g. HGNC)

fields.name: Gene
fields.desc: Stable ID of affected gene

fields.name: Gene_ncbi
fields.desc: Stable ID of feature

fields.name: Feature_type
fields.desc: Type of feature - Transcript, RegulatoryFeature or MotifFeature

fields.name: Feature
fields.desc: Stable ID of feature

fields.name: Feature_ncbi
fields.desc: Stable ID of feature

fields.name: BIOTYPE
fields.desc: Biotype of transcript or regulatory feature

fields.name: EXON
fields.desc: Exon number(s) / total

fields.name: INTRON
fields.desc: Intron number(s) / total

fields.name: HGVSc
fields.desc: HGVS coding sequence name

fields.name: HGVSp
fields.desc: HGVS protein sequence name

fields.name: cDNA_position
fields.desc: Relative position of base pair in cDNA sequence

fields.name: CDS_position
fields.desc: Relative position of base pair in coding sequence

fields.name: Protein_position
fields.desc: Relative position of amino acid in protein

fields.name: Amino_acids
fields.desc: Reference and variant amino acids

fields.name: Codons
fields.desc: Reference and variant codon sequence

fields.name: Existing_variation
fields.desc: Identifier(s) of co-located known variants

fields.name: DISTANCE
fields.desc: Shortest distance from variant to transcript

fields.name: STRAND
fields.desc: Strand of the feature

fields.name: FLAGS
fields.desc: Transcript quality flags

fields.name: VARIANT_CLASS
fields.desc: SO variant class

fields.name: SYMBOL_SOURCE
fields.desc: Source of gene symbol

fields.name: HGNC_ID
fields.desc: Stable identifer of HGNC gene symbol

fields.name: CANONICAL
fields.desc: Indicates if transcript is canonical for this gene

fields.name: MANE
fields.desc: MANE (Matched Annotation by NCBI and EMBL-EBI) Transcript

fields.name: TSL
fields.desc: Transcript support level

fields.name: APPRIS
fields.desc: Annotates alternatively spliced transcripts as primary or alternate based on a range of computational methods

fields.name: CCDS
fields.desc: Indicates if transcript is a CCDS transcript

fields.name: ENSP
fields.desc: Protein identifer

fields.name: SWISSPROT
fields.desc: UniProtKB/Swiss-Prot accession

fields.name: TREMBL
fields.desc: UniProtKB/TrEMBL accession

fields.name: UNIPARC
fields.desc: UniParc accession

fields.name: GENE_PHENO
fields.desc: Indicates if gene is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait

fields.name: SIFT
fields.desc: SIFT prediction and/or score

fields.name: PolyPhen
fields.desc: PolyPhen prediction and/or score

fields.name: DOMAINS
fields.desc: The source and identifer of any overlapping protein domains

fields.name: miRNA
fields.desc: SO terms of overlapped miRNA secondary structure feature(s)

fields.name: HGVS_OFFSET
fields.desc: Indicates by how many bases the HGVS notations for this variant have been shifted

fields.name: CLIN_SIG
fields.desc: ClinVar clinical significance of the dbSNP variant

fields.name: SOMATIC
fields.desc: Somatic status of existing variant

fields.name: PHENO
fields.desc: Indicates if existing variant(s) is associated with a phenotype, disease or trait; multiple values correspond to multiple variants

fields.name: PUBMED
fields.desc: Pubmed ID(s) of publications that cite existing variant

fields.name: MOTIF_NAME
fields.desc: The source and identifier of a transcription factor binding profile (TFBP) aligned at this position

fields.name: MOTIF_POS
fields.desc: The relative position of the variation in the aligned TFBP

fields.name: HIGH_INF_POS
fields.desc: A flag indicating if the variant falls in a high information position of the TFBP

fields.name: MOTIF_SCORE_CHANGE
fields.desc: The difference in motif score of the reference and variant sequences for the TFBP

fields.name: MaxEntScan_alt
fields.desc: MaxEntScan alternate sequence score

fields.name: MaxEntScan_diff
fields.desc: MaxEntScan score difference

fields.name: MaxEntScan_ref
fields.desc: MaxEntScan reference sequence score

fields.name: TSSDistance
fields.desc: Distance from the transcription start site

fields.name: SpliceRegion
fields.desc: SpliceRegion predictions

fields.name: cytoband
fields.desc: cytoband

fields.name: UNIPROTKB_AC
fields.desc: UniprotKB accession number

fields.name: ANNOT_DESC
fields.desc: transmembrance description

fields.name: ID
fields.desc: dbSNP RS number

fields.name: PHASTCONS100
fields.desc: PhastCons 100 way score

fields.name: PHASTCONS30
fields.desc: PhastCons 30 way score

fields.name: PHASTCONS20
fields.desc: PhastCons 20 way score

fields.name: PHYLOP100
fields.desc: PhyloP 100 way score

fields.name: PHYLOP30
fields.desc: PhyloP 30 way score

fields.name: PHYLOP20
fields.desc: PhyloP 20 way score

fields.name: GERP
fields.desc: GERP score

fields.name: primateDL_score
fields.desc: PrimateAI score

fields.name: PHRED
fields.desc: CADD Phred score

fields.name: SYMBOL
fields.desc: affected gene symbol

fields.name: DS_AG
fields.desc: delta scores (DS) for acceptor gain (AG)

fields.name: DS_AL
fields.desc: delta scores (DS) for acceptor loss (AL)

fields.name: DS_DG
fields.desc: delta scores (DS) for donor gain (DG)

fields.desc: delta scores (DS) for donor loss (DL)

fields.name: DP_AG
fields.desc: delta positions (DP) for acceptor gain (AG)

fields.desc: delta positions (DP) for acceptor loss (AL)

fields.name: DP_DG
fields.desc: delta positions (DP) for donor gain (DG)

fields.name: DP_DL
fields.desc: delta positions (DP) for donor loss (DL)

fields.desc: maximum population allele frequency from gnomAD gnome v3.0

fields.desc: depth

fields.desc: Total allele number

fields.desc: Allele count

fields.desc: Allele frequency

fields.name: Het
fields.desc: number of heterozygous genotype

fields.name: Hom
fields.desc: number of homozygous genotype

fields.name: AC
fields.desc: Allele count in called genotypes

fields.name: AN
fields.desc: Total number of alleles in called genotypes

fields.name: AF
fields.desc: Allele frequency in called genotypes

fields.name: AF_AFR
fields.desc: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in African population (YRI,LWK,ASW)

fields.name: AF_AMR
fields.desc: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in American population (MXL,CLM,PUR)

fields.name: AF_ASN
fields.desc: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in Asian population (CHB,CHS,JPT)

fields.name: AF_EUR
fields.desc: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Allele Frequency in European population (CEU,TSI,FIN,GBR,IBS)

fields.name: AF_MAX
fields.desc: 1000 Genomes Phase 1 Maximum Allele Frequency

fields.name: ESP_MAF
fields.desc: Minor allele frequecy in percent for European American, African American and All populations in the NHLBI Exome Sequencing Project (ESP)

fields.name: otherChrom
fields.desc: chromosome

fields.name: otherStart
fields.desc: start position

fields.name: otherEnd
fields.desc: end position

fields.name: fracMatch
fields.desc: fraction of matching bases

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Simple Repeats tag name

fields.name: sequence
fields.desc: Sequence of repeat unit element

fields.name: chrom
fields.desc: chromosome

fields.name: chromStart
fields.desc: start position

fields.name: chromEnd
fields.desc: end position

fields.name: score
fields.desc: Alignment Score = 2*match-7*mismatch-7*indel; minscore=50

fields.name: entropy
fields.desc: Entropy

fields.name: repName
fields.desc: Name of repeat

fields.name: repClass
fields.desc: Class of repeat

fields.name: repFamily
fields.desc: Family of repeat

fields.name: chromStart
fields.desc: Start in genomic sequence

fields.name: chromEnd
fields.desc: End in genomic sequence

fields.name: strand
fields.desc: Relative orientation + or -

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Name of item

fields.name: chrom
fields.desc: Chromosome

fields.name: chromStart
fields.desc: Start position in chromosome

fields.name: chromEnd
fields.desc: End position in chromosome

fields.name: strand
fields.desc: +, -, or . for mixed (some fragments +, some -)

fields.name: score
fields.desc: Average of fragment identity scores, transformed into 0..1000 range for shading

fields.name: repClass
fields.desc: Class of repeat

fields.name: repFamily
fields.desc: Family of repeat

fields.name: name
fields.desc: Name of item

fields.name: chrom
fields.desc: Reference sequence chromosome or scaffold

fields.name: chromStart
fields.desc: Start position in chromosome

fields.name: chromEnd
fields.desc: End position in chromosome

fields.name: ALLELEID
fields.desc: the ClinVar Allele ID

fields.name: CLNDN
fields.desc: ClinVar's preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB

fields.name: CLNDNINCL
fields.desc: For included Variant : ClinVar's preferred disease name for the concept specified by disease identifiers in CLNDISDB

fields.name: CLNDISDB
fields.desc: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN

fields.name: CLNDISDBINCL
fields.desc: For included Variant: Tag-value pairs of disease database name and identifier, e.g. OMIM:NNNNNN

fields.name: CLNHGVS
fields.desc: Top-level (primary assembly, alt, or patch) HGVS expression.

fields.name: CLNREVSTAT
fields.desc: ClinVar review status for the Variation ID

fields.name: CLNSIG
fields.desc: Clinical significance for this single variant

fields.name: CLNSIGCONF
fields.desc: Conflicting clinical significance for this single variant

fields.name: CLNSIGINCL
fields.desc: Clinical significance for a haplotype or genotype that includes this variant. Reported as pairs of VariationID:clinical significance.

fields.name: CLNVC
fields.desc: Variant type

fields.name: CLNVCSO
fields.desc: Sequence Ontology id for variant type

fields.name: CLNVI
fields.desc: the variant's clinical sources reported as tag-value pairs of database and variant identifier

fields.name: GENEINFO
fields.desc: Gene(s) for the variant reported as gene symbol:gene id. The gene symbol and id are delimited by a colon (:) and each pair is delimited by a vertical bar (|)

fields.name: MC
fields.desc: comma separated list of molecular consequence in the form of Sequence Ontology ID|molecular_consequence

fields.name: ORIGIN
fields.desc: Allele origin. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unknown; 1 - germline; 2 - somatic; 4 - inherited; 8 - paternal; 16 - maternal; 32 - de-novo; 64 - biparental; 128 - uniparental; 256 - not-tested; 512 - tested-inconclusive; 1073741824 - other

fields.name: SSR
fields.desc: Variant Suspect Reason Codes. One or more of the following values may be added: 0 - unspecified, 1 - Paralog, 2 - byEST, 4 - oldAlign, 8 - Para_EST, 16 - 1kg_failed, 1024 - other

fields.name: GENOMIC_MUTATION_ID
fields.desc: Genomic mutation identifier (COSV) to indicate the definitive position of the variant on the genome. This identifier is trackable and stable between different versions of the release.

fields.name: LEGACY_MUTATION_ID
fields.desc: Legacy mutation identifier (COSM) that will represent existing COSM mutation identifiers.

fields.name: MUTATION_ID
fields.desc: An internal mutation identifier to uniquely represent each mutation on a specific transcript on a given assembly build.

fields.name: Accession Number
fields.desc: The transcript identifier of the gene.

fields.name: Primary site
fields.desc: The primary tissue/cancer from which the sample originated. More details on the tissue classification are avaliable from here. In COSMIC we have standard classification system for tissue types and sub types because they vary a lot between different papers.

fields.name: Site subtype 1
fields.desc: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Site subtype 2
fields.desc: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Site subtype 3
fields.desc: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Primary histology
fields.desc: The histological classification of the sample.

fields.name: Histology subtype 1
fields.desc: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample.

fields.name: Histology subtype 2
fields.desc: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample.

fields.name: Histology subtype 3
fields.desc: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample.

fields.name: Mutation CDS
fields.desc: The change that has occurred in the nucleotide sequence. Formatting is identical to the method used for the peptide sequence.

fields.name: Mutation AA
fields.desc: The change that has occurred in the peptide sequence. Formatting is based on the recommendations made by the Human Genome Variation Society. The description of each type can be found by following the link to Mutation Overview page.

fields.name: Mutation Description
fields.desc: Type of mutation at the amino acid level (substitution, deletion, insertion, complex, fusion, unknown etc.)

fields.name: Mutation zygosity
fields.desc: Information on whether the mutation was reported to be homozygous , heterozygous or unknown within the sample.

fields.name: LOH
fields.desc: LOH Information on whether the gene was reported to have loss of heterozygosity in the sample: yes, no or unknown.

fields.name: Mutation genome position
fields.desc: The genomic coordinates of the mutation.

fields.name: Resistance Mutation
fields.desc: mutation confers drug resistance (see CosmicResistanceMutations.tsv.gz for gene/drug details).

fields.name: Mutation somatic status
fields.desc: Information on whether the sample was reported to be Confirmed Somatic, Previously Reported or Variant of unknown origin

fields.name: Pubmed_PMID
fields.desc: The PUBMED ID for the paper that the sample was noted in, linking to pubmed to provide more details of the publication.

fields.name: ID_STUDY
fields.desc: Lists the unique Ids of studies that have involved this sample.

fields.name: Tumour origin
fields.desc: Describes where the sample has originated from including the tumour type.
